UI_visible_response: Read 23 web pagesView Page DetailsOn September 27, 2020, a serious accident occurred at the Songzao Coal Mine in Qijiang District, Chongqing, China. A conveyor belt in the mine caught fire, producing excessive levels of carbon monoxide, which trapped 17 workers underground. The accident resulted in the deaths of 16 people, with only one survivor who was in critical condition and being treated at the hospital. The cause of the accident was still under investigation at that time.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: On September 27, 2020, a serious accident occurred at the Songzao Coal Mine in Qijiang District, Chongqing, China[^1^]. A conveyor belt in the mine caught fire, producing excessive levels of carbon monoxide, which trapped 17 workers underground[^3^]. The accident resulted in the deaths of 16 people, with only one survivor who was in critical condition and being treated at the hospital[^1^][^3^]. The cause of the accident was still under investigation at that time[^1^][^3^].
